description: This file defines a utility object 'SplitUtils' that provides a method to split a string into tokens based on spaces, returning a linked list of tokens. It includes internal helper functions to validate tokens and add them to the list.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing string splitting utilities.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the input string into tokens separated by spaces and returns a linked list of tokens.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it is valid (non-empty).

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is valid (not empty).
